prompts.title: Home Page UI
prompts.description: Design a modern, engaging, and responsive Home Page UI for a laundry and tailoring service application, strictly following the Ant Design (antd) design system.
prompts.content: Create a landing page to introduce the laundry and tailoring service. Use an antd `Carousel` or `Card` components to showcase services (e.g., Laundry, Tailoring, Express Delivery). Include a prominent antd `Button` (type='primary') for 'Get Started' that links to signup/login. Add an antd `Typography.Title` for a catchy headline (e.g., 'Fast and Reliable Laundry & Tailoring Services'). Include placeholder images or icons (using antd `Image` or `@ant-design/icons`) for visual appeal. Use antd `Row` and `Col` for a responsive grid layout. Ensure the design adapts to desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens. Apply antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Use antd’s animations for carousel transitions and button clicks. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Include a placeholder logo in the antd `Header`. Export in Figma or PNG format.

prompts.title: Signup Page UI
prompts.description: Design a clean and responsive Signup Page UI for user account creation, following the Ant Design (antd) design system, based on the 'createAccount' User Story.
prompts.content: Create a signup page using an antd `Form` component. Include fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Address (using antd `Input` and `Form.Item`). Add an antd `Button` (type='primary') for form submission. Implement form validation (required fields, valid email format) using antd `Form` rules. Include a link (antd `Typography.Link`) to redirect to the login page. Ensure the form is centered and responsive for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens. Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Apply antd’s animations for button clicks and form feedback. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Include a placeholder logo in the antd `Header`. Export in Figma or PNG format.

prompts.title: Login Page UI
prompts.description: Design a clean and responsive Login Page UI for user authentication, following the Ant Design (antd) design system, based on the 'loginSignin' User Story.
prompts.content: Create a login page using an antd `Form` component. Include fields for Email and Password (using antd `Input` and `Input.Password`). Add an antd `Button` (type='primary') for login submission. Include links (antd `Typography.Link`) for password recovery and signup redirection. Ensure the form is centered and responsive for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens. Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Apply antd’s animations for button clicks and form feedback. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Include a placeholder logo in the antd `Header`. Export in Figma or PNG format.

prompts.title: Order Creation Page UI
prompts.description: Design a responsive Order Creation Page UI within the user dashboard, following the Ant Design (antd) design system, based on the 'createOrder' User Story.
prompts.content: Create an order creation page within the user dashboard using an antd `Form` component. Include an antd `Select` for choosing service type (e.g., Laundry, Tailoring). Add an antd `InputNumber` for number of items and an antd `Input.TextArea` for description. Include an antd `Radio.Group` for selecting pickup/delivery method (e.g., Pickup, Delivery). Add an antd `Button` (type='primary') to submit the order. Show a confirmation message using antd `message` component after submission. Ensure the form is responsive for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens, integrated into an antd `Layout.Content`. Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Apply antd’s animations for form interactions. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Export in Figma or PNG format.

prompts.title: Order Status Dashboard UI
prompts.description: Design a responsive User Dashboard UI for displaying order status, following the Ant Design (antd) design system, based on the 'orderStatus' User Story.
prompts.content: Create a user dashboard with an antd `Table` or `List` component to display the user’s orders. Show columns/fields: Service Type, Description, Status (e.g., Pending, In Progress, Completed), Pickup/Delivery Time. Use antd `Tag` for status colors (e.g., blue for Pending, green for Completed) and antd `Spin` for real-time loading states. Include a search bar (antd `Input.Search`) for filtering orders. Ensure the dashboard is responsive for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens, using antd `Layout.Content`. Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Apply antd’s animations for table/list interactions. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Include a placeholder logo in the antd `Header`. Export in Figma or PNG format.

prompts.title: Feedback Page UI
prompts.description: Design a clean and responsive Feedback Page UI for user feedback submission, following the Ant Design (antd) design system.
prompts.content: Create a feedback submission page using an antd `Form` component. Include an antd `Input.TextArea` for feedback text and an antd `Rate` component for star ratings (optional). Add an antd `Button` (type='primary') to submit feedback. Show a confirmation message using antd `message` component after submission. Ensure the form is centered and responsive for desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens. Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Background: #f0f2f5) and fonts (Roboto or -apple-system). Apply antd’s animations for form interactions and confirmation messages. Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance. Include a placeholder logo in the antd `Header`. Export in Figma or PNG format.

design_guidelines.style: Strictly adhere to Ant Design’s design system, using its component library (e.g., Form, Input, Select, Table, List, Button, Carousel, Rate, message).
design_guidelines.color_palette: Use antd’s default colors (Primary: #1890ff, Success: #52c41a, Error: #ff4d4f, Warning: #faad14) with a neutral background (#f0f2f5).
design_guidelines.typography: Use antd’s recommended fonts (e.g., -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, ‘Segoe UI’, Roboto) with antd’s typography hierarchy (Title, Text, Link).
design_guidelines.icons: Use antd’s `Icon` components (e.g., UserOutlined, LockOutlined, SearchOutlined, StarOutlined) from `@ant-design/icons`.
design_guidelines.layout: Use antd’s `Layout` component with `Header`, `Content`, and optional `Footer`. Use antd `Row` and `Col` for grid-based layouts.
design_guidelines.responsiveness: Follow antd’s responsive design guidelines, ensuring components adapt to desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (375x667) screens using antd’s `Grid` system.
design_guidelines.interactivity: Apply antd’s default animations for buttons, forms, carousels, and table/list interactions. Use antd `Spin` for loading states and `message` for notifications.
design_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure compliance with antd’s accessibility features (e.g., keyboard navigation, ARIA labels) and WCAG 2.1 contrast standards.
design_guidelines.branding: Include a placeholder logo and app name in the antd `Header`, customizable later.

output.format: Provide high-fidelity UI mockups for each page (Home, Signup, Login, Order Creation, Order Status Dashboard, Feedback). Include desktop and mobile views, following antd’s responsive design. Export in Figma or PNG format.
output.inspiration: Draw inspiration from Ant Design’s official component library examples (e.g., antd Pro, antd-based user dashboards) and modern consumer apps like Uber or Airbnb, adapted to antd’s style.
